## DataPackage.addResourceHandler() method

Registers a new handler for processing resources.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addResourceHandler(handler: ProfileHandler): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handler | [ProfileHandler](./workflow.profilehandler.md) | the resource handler |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
